review.label: Nice two level apartment in great London location. Located in quiet small street, but just 50 meters from main street and bus stop. Tube station is short walk, just like two grocery stores.
Nice two level apartment in great London location. Located in quiet small street, but just 50 meters from main street and bus stop. Tube station is short walk, just like two grocery stores.
